programme.title: 亲 Kin - EP 281
programme.desc: Jessica uses her clout to launch Mira's fashion line at Luxe. Razali demands Zara to cut off contact with Maisarah. Concerned that the Bala children are losing their roots, Mathilda takes it upon herself to ensure the family tradition is passed on.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Runs In The Family - EP 27
programme.desc: Chef Joe's decision to follow in his celebrity chef dad Sam Leong's footsteps becomes all the more poignant when Sam is stricken with cancer. What happens next reveals the depth of familial bonds. On The Red Dot tracks 4 parents and their children who have decided to follow the same career path. Behind the mutual love and respect are hidden stories of fear and regret.

programme.title: Everyday Gourmet With Justine Schofield S6 - EP 64
programme.desc: Hosted by popular series one MasterChef contestant, Justine Schofield. Everyday Gourmet presents can-do cooking ideas as well as tips, tricks and insights into making us all more confident in the kitchen. programme.desc: Dottie Doc McStuffins is an amazing six-year-old girl who has a special secret. She has the ability to talk to toys and stuffed animals. Whatever the problem, the Doc is always in, and everyone always gets better!

programme.title: 最家选择 No Place Like Home - EP 1

Or do Ben and Chloe - an engaged couple, have many many other variables to take into account? (重)正要结婚的新婚夫妇，必然会面对买房子的问题。到底该买一间BTO，还是买一间转售组屋呢？要买多大的房子？要住在那里？一连串的疑问，总会在脑海里浮现，挥之不去。就像这一集的Ben和Chloe一样，他们已经订婚了，并准备买一间房子。但和许多正要结婚的夫妇一样，他们发现还有许多因素他们必须考量。.

(重)每一个邻里都有一些小店铺。在杂乱无章的小店里，累积了许多温馨感人的小故事。主持人李心钰将带着一位室内设计师走进这些有故事的店，为店面改头换面，让店主能在更好的环境继续营业。.

programme.title: 古早味侦探 Old Taste Detective - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Originating in Guangzhou, Wanton Mee is one of Singapore's favourite noodle dish. Since last century, the wanton soup has evolved to dry noodles mixed with white, black and red sauces. In this episode, host Yi Feng and Chef Benson recreate the old taste by using a bamboo pole to make the noodles. (重)源自广州的云吞面，是本地人最喜欢的面食之一。上世纪初来流传到南洋后，云吞汤面被做成干捞的，发展出了白、黑和红三派拌面酱汁。这一集主持人和厨师唐本陞找来竹竿打面制作竹昇面，以还原百分之百的古早味！.

programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue her. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces…. (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 64

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 6

programme.title: 加文纳桥的约定 Love At Cavenagh Bridge - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Every dawn and dusk, Wei Guang, an old man in his seventies, will come to the Cavenagh Bridge and stand there waiting. This is the place where he first met his first and only love, Hui Yi. Hui Yi was from a rich family and Wei Guang was just a poor chap. Their love was forbidden by her parents and they were forced to break up. They decided to elope and used a riddle as the clue to their rendezvous point. Dan, Mie and Juliana are avid cyclists who met on Cavenagh Bridge and became buddies. Dan fell in love at first sight with Juliana, Mie holds a torch for Dan, and Juliana flirts with Mie all the time. One day, Dan challenged Juliana to a race, and the loser must agree to one request from the winner. Mie suddenly disappeared before the race, and resurfaced with a brand new look after the race, which throws this threesome into a new form of love triangle... (重)每天清晨和傍晚，七旬老翁伟光都会来到加纹纳桥上，呆呆伫立桥中央，似乎在等着什么人。他到底在等谁？这个人会不会再出现？原来，同样在这座桥上，他邂逅了他的初恋情人，也是唯一情人，慧仪。可是，慧仪是千金小姐，所以两人被女方的父亲棒打鸳鸯，被迫分离。两人毅然决定私奔，并且利用一道灯谜来互通会合地点……偏偏伟光没有能够参透灯谜，等到他揭开谜底的时候，慧仪早已经被父亲送走。五十年来，伟光就每天都回来桥上，希望有一天，慧仪真的能出现，履行承诺…… 阿丹和小米、茱莲娜因为骑车在桥上相遇，很快成为无所不谈的朋友。阿丹对茱莲娜一见钟情，小米对阿丹刻骨铭心，茱莲娜却和小米暧昧不断。有一天，阿丹决定约茱莲娜比赛，只要谁赢了，就能要求对方做一件事情。小米却在比赛前就人间蒸发，等到比赛完毕后，才以全新的姿态出现，把三角关系“复杂明朗化"…….

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Renya feels sad when she knows Zhenyu is suffering from Memory Overload Syndrome. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)知道振宇得了"过剩记忆症候群"病后，仁雅感到很难过。事务长劝仁雅在振宇面前假装不知他得病的事，再加上振宇所剩的时间不多了，一切就按他的意望去做。.

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Chen Huan, popstars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. (重)由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。.

programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Pig's organ soup. Kway chap. Sup tulang. While some may consider them roadside oddities, Singaporeans embrace them as national treasures. Join us on Food Empire as we dissect the Singaporean take on nose-to-tail dining. (重).

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) This episode, Pornsak heads to Lake Hamana in Japan to learn about eel farming and takes a look at rice farming technology in Shizuoka. He is back to his hometown to learn about the cultivation of Thai jasmine rice. Cui Fang heads to Pontian, Malaysia to learn about local offshore fishing operation. (重)在这一集的节目中，Pornsak前往日本滨松市滨名湖了解鳗鱼养殖。他也前往静冈一窥日本的水稻种植技术，再回到故乡泰国了解茉莉香米的种植。而林翠芳则前往马来西亚笨珍，了解当地渔民的近海捕捞作业。.

programme.title: 健康在于你 11 Here's To Health 11 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In "Here's to Health 11", our host Lim Peifen will discuss various health issues and share how we can promote healthy living with probiotics. She will also shed light on the importance of prevention to encourage everyone to eat and live healthily. (重)(最后一集)《健康在于你11》新系列节目再次邀请主持人林佩芬和大家一起探讨各种健康课题，分享如何通过益生菌保健，展开健康生活，阐明预防胜于治疗与自我保健的重要性，希望大家都能吃得健康、活得健康。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) In China, 1 in every 13 Chinese is potentially down on depression. Jojo Goh visits a youth centre in Beijing that runs a boot camp-like program for depressed youths, and an organisation in Hangzhou that relies on a personal support network. What is the biggest obstacle in the fight against depression? (重)数据显示，中国有将近1亿名忧郁症患者。每13名中国人当中，就有一人患病。吴俐璇亲访北京一家帮助青少年患者的青年康复中心，也前去杭州了解推动心理健康的慈善组织如何进行科普，说服更多中国患者及时求医。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 57
programme.desc: (R) Haixiu tries to convince Xiuzi to accept her, but Xiuzi shames her for being unrealistic. Yuzhen and Xiuzi quarrel over Haixiu. Xiuzi slaps Yuzhen. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海秀尝试说服秀子接受她，却被秀子指没有自知之明。宇真听到海秀和秀子的对话，觉得秀子很过分。两母子为了海秀吵架，秀子还打了宇真一巴掌。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 58
programme.desc: (R) The DNA report reveals that Yuncan and Tongbai are biologically related. Yuncan tells Meina that he will provide for Meina and Tongbai, but he hopes they will stay away from him. Meina wants Yuncan to acknowledge Tongbai or she will reveal everything to Yuncan's wife-to-be. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)亲子鉴定结果显示允灿和桐白是亲属关系。允灿跟美娜见面，答应让她和桐白衣食无忧，希望她们不要扰乱他的生活。美娜要允灿跟桐白相认，否则将一切告知允灿的另一半。.

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Wenzhi brings Zhenghou home to meet Mingxi, hoping to establish whether Zhenghou is the Healer. Mingxi shows Zhenghou the photo of her late daughter, Zhian. Zhenghou is shocked to find that Zhian and Yingxin are the same person. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)文植怀疑正厚就是Healer，于是将他带到自己家，想让明熙与他见面来判断正厚是不是那天夜闯入他家的Healer。明熙带正厚到她的房间，向他介绍了照片中早逝的女儿智安。正厚惊讶地发现智安就是英信，内心崩溃不已。.

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Zhenghou questions Wenhao for lying to him that Zhian is dead. Wenhao explains that he did so in order to protect Zhian. Zhenghou angrily warns Wenhao not to intervene between Yingxin and him anymore. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)正厚知道文浩骗他智安死了，十分生气地去找文浩问个清楚。文浩解释不让人知道智安还活着是为了保护她。愤怒的正厚警告文浩从今以后不要再插手他和英信的事。.

programme.title: 我想和你唱3 Come Sing With Me 3 - EP 4

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 21

programme.title: 新语研究所 Fun With SINGnese - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Fun with SINGnese is an infotainment series that explores the origins of local Chinese-Dialect words. This episode discusses how the terms Lokun (doctor), Good Brothers (wandering spirits), Eat Snake (be lazy) came about and explains the use of "miles" in naming of places during the old days. (重)《新语研究所》是富有趣味性的资讯节目，和大家轻松谈论新加坡的独特华语及方言词汇。为什么医生叫做老君？为什么我们称孤魂野鬼为好兄弟？为什么我们用吃蛇来比喻偷懒？后港六条石的"石"指的是什么？.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) With the increase in ownership of smartphones, people has been spending more time browsing the internet and social media sites. Is it possible that technology can help to increase the possibility of finding true love? Allow us to examine the different perspectives of the X & Y generation! (PG)(重)现在每个人都人手一机，科技和网络世界占据了时间颇长！是不是爱情也可以从网络世界找回来呢？虚拟世界的爱情靠谱吗？到底现代的男人女人如何通过科技经营这复杂的两性关系？且看X、Y世代艺人代表的唇枪舌剑！.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Shanyu and Hengkui are not appreciative when they hear about how Zhen-ai has given up on her dream house for their sake. Hengkui even blames Zhen-ai for making him look bad. Dongchu slaps Hengkui for not being grateful to Zhen-ai. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真爱为了小菜店和家人放弃自己喜欢的房子，珊玉和亨奎却不领情，亨奎还怪真爱故意要让他变成没有用的长子。东出觉得真爱很委屈，于是打亨奎一巴掌。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 24
programme.desc: (R)Fengshun's game design is officially adopted, and Fengshun becomes a member of the development team. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)奉顺的游戏设计正式通过了。奉顺顺理成章地成为了开发组的一员。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 67
programme.desc: Ruli recounts how Zhiyuan mistreated her in the past to Zhuhao, who gets furious at Zhiyuan. Knowing that Ruli is Zhiyuan's daughter, Haizhu vows to severe their relationship to avenge for Jiaya. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)如莉把过去十几年智媛所做的事情都跟父亲说了，柱浩浩非常生气. 知道如莉是智媛的女儿，海珠打算让智媛亲手摧毁如莉为嘉亚报仇。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 68
programme.desc: Daozi and Haizhu compete to become the heir of WID Group. Haizhu forces Liemei to hand over Daozhi's design and instructs Zhiyuan to make counterfeits of the design to sell in the street markets. Zhiyuan is excited when she learns from the orphanage's director that the baby she abandoned is still alive. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海珠和道治竞争为WID集团继承人，海珠逼烈梅把道治的设计交出，吩咐智媛把设计外泄制造山寨版在地摊购售。听到孤儿院长说自己遗弃的孩子还活着，智媛感到焦急。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 10
programme.desc: Nadia decides to quit her job and take a trip overseas. Mei Qi wants to celebrate for her and invites Aidan to the house for a meal. She purposely makes out with him and Nadia is heartbroken and cries. Mei Qi intends to keep Nadia in Singapore and lies to Shi Jie that Nadia no longer wants to quit. Nadia loses her memory and goes back to work the next day. Aidan discovers an entry in his calendar about Nadia's last working day and sending her off at the airport. (PG-些许性相关语)Nadia辞职要出国度假，美琪为她庆祝，邀请Aidan到家，故意和他亲热，让Nadia难受落泪。美琪要让Nadia留在新加坡，骗施姐Nadia不辞职了。Nadia失忆般重新回去上班。Aidan却发现他的日历里有Nadia辞职，和送她飞机的记录。Aidan好像人格分裂那样，对美琪无法自拔地爱着，另一方面又感觉是有蹊跷。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 14
programme.desc: Wanpei brings his men to the hospital to kill Shangbi and realises that Wuzhou is also present at the ward. Wuzhou finally understands that Wenshu wants to frame him for Shangbi's death. Wuzhou loosens Shangbi's handcuffs. The two fight off Wanpei and his men together. programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 2 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 2 - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) This food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)美食节目介绍有特色的台湾料理，也同时披露每道菜肴背后的感人故事。.

programme.title: 十大新加坡 Top 10 Singapore - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Deemed as Asia's food paradise, Singapore is where one can find delicacies of all nationalities and eating is considered the second national pastime. Yet, with so many self-professed foodies and gourmands, Singapore finds many of its traditional foods and flavours vanishing. What has gone wrong? (重)新加坡是亚洲美食天堂，齐聚各国美食；新加坡人也爱吃也舍得吃，但可惜的是很多本地传统美食却因为各种原因而被遗忘，甚至消失。本集请来各路饕客、人气博客、文人和爱吃一族来探讨新加坡美食文化里究竟消失了些什么。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Dongchu is beaten up by a gang of men when he is mistaken for seducing a married woman. Xuncai witnesses the fight and tries to help Dongchu. He gets embroiled in the conflict and is brought to the police station. Yingshan is impressed with Hengkui when he manages to get Xuncai out of custody. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)东出到舞厅工作，结果被顾客的丈夫误以为是牛郎，追着东出满街打。勋才看到东出被多人围殴，尝试阻止，自己反而被打，一伙人闹上警局。真爱要求亨奎帮助勋才，亨奎本来不肯，后来因为认得英善，才故意伸出援手。勋才被释放，英善对亨奎另眼相看。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Biao Nali is a weather forecaster for SBC. She volunteers to go to Bangkok with the camera crew and assist in the TV station's open recruitment advertisement production to earn more money. At the airport, she once again runs into reporter Li Huaxin, who is a Bangkok correspondent and someone she once had a crazy crush on... (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)SBC气象预报员表娜丽为了努力赚钱，自愿跟摄影队，前往曼谷协助电视台在海外公开招募工作人员的广告制作。在机场，她再次与曾热烈地单恋过的曼谷特派员李华信记者重逢了。。。。。。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 69
programme.desc: Zhiyuan is deeply hurt by Haizhu who chased her out of the house and allowing Cui Meixi to move in. Haizhu confesses she is taking revenge on Zhiyuan for causing Jiaya's death. Zhuhao confirms that Ruli is Zhiyuan's daughter when she tells him that her daughter has a burn scar on her shoulder. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海珠把智媛赶出而安排崔美熙搬进家里，令智媛伤心。海珠声称是为了替嘉亚报仇。智媛向柱浩确认女儿肩上有巴印，柱浩确定如莉是智媛女儿。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 70
programme.desc: Haizhu pushes Zhuhao down the stairs when she tries to stop him from revealing to Zhiyuan that Ruli is her daughter. Haizhu is happy when she learns that Ruli is going to charge Zhiyuan for kidnapping Zhuhao. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)为了阻止柱浩告诉智媛如莉是她的女儿，无意把柱浩推下楼梯.得知如莉将要告智媛涉嫌绑架及软禁她父亲，暗地开心。.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 5
programme.desc: This episode, Pornsak explores on matcha production in Uji, Japan and cultivation and harvest of tea leaves in Nangang, Taipei. He and Cui Fang also fly to Australia and South Korea respectively to learn how local farmers mix technology and nature to cultivate good quality strawberries and peaches. 在这一集节目中，Pornsak前往日本宇治一探抹茶的制作，到台北南港了解茶叶的种植和采收。Pornsak和林翠芳分别前往澳大利亚和韩国，了解当地果农如何借由科技结合自然培育出优质草莓和水蜜桃。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 15
programme.desc: Zaiyi and Shangbi pass incriminating photos of Wenshu and Wuzhou to reporter Liu Jingzhen. Jingzhen uses the photos in a television news bulletin. Wenshu's face is seen clearly, but Wuzhou's face is blurred. This leads Wenshu to suspect that Wuzhou has betrayed her. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)在伊和尚弼知道刘景真记者不畏惧权势，于是将文淑和五洲18年前干案的照片交给刘景真记者。景真果然在电视新闻上公开照片。文淑的样子看得很清楚，五洲的脸却被遮住，令文淑认为是五洲出卖她的。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Tai Hu tried all means to bring down the eatery. Meiwei went for quality instead of quantity. She invited many food reporters to try their food. Tai Hu threatened the reporters not to write anything about the eatery nor publish their advertisements, barring it from all sorts of media exposure. (PG)(重)美薇不肯原谅富贵当年所犯的错。浩伦发挥其宣传手段，终吸引食客们再度光顾小吃店，但泰虎不惜砸大钱，不断重挫小吃店。眼看众人决定放弃小吃店，泰虎竟因不甘厨艺遭父亲质疑，向小吃店发出美食‘生死战’.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Medical insurance only provides treatment coverage but not happiness. The greatest challenge for nursing homes in Japan is how to make the elderly live happily. The nursing homes in Nagoya have special services to attract the elderly. Let's follow the fixer to uncover the truth about these homes. (重)医疗保险通常只是提供治疗保障，不考虑幸福感的需求，如何让老人快乐地活下去，是日本托老所面临的最大挑战。名古屋的老人院就有奇招，贴心服务，老人家争相前来。这一集就让线人为我们揭开托老所的真实现状。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Director Shen and Zhexiong arrange to have lunch with Zaimin and Caili when they hear that the youngsters are getting along well. The quick-witted Hengshun saves the day when Zaimin is about to be exposed for getting another person to meet up with Caili at the match-making session previously. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)申在民的父亲跟哲雄原来是老朋友。两人听说采莉跟在民交往顺利，特地安排了饭局。采莉高兴，赴约前传简讯给亨顺，亨顺这才知道顶替在民相亲的事即将被揭穿了。亨顺灵机一动，再次帮在民解围。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Nali meets Huaxin at the TV station again. She suspects Huaxin is suffering from breast cancer. She worries for him as both her mother and grandmother passed away with breast cancer. Nali asks Huaxin to go for a check-up. Huaxin, a male chauvinist, feels horrified and tells Nali off. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)娜丽在电视台再次遇见华信，对华信感到担心，说怀疑他患上了乳腺癌，因为外婆和妈妈都因为乳腺癌去世, 让他到医院去检查一下，让大男人主义的华信感到很惊慌，并用恶言把娜丽骂走。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 71
programme.desc: Zhuhao notices Xiaochun's frightened look upon seeing Zhiyuan, so he comforts her that Zhiyuan is her grandmother and will love her. Zhuhao's words arouse Monian's suspicion. She secretly did a DNA test for Ruli and Zhiyuan. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)柱浩看到小春害怕智媛，他安慰说智媛身为婆婆会爱她的，这番话令末年怀疑，偷偷跟如莉与智媛做亲子检测.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 72
programme.desc: Monian is happy that Zhiyuan and Ruli are not related from the DNA test report but in actuality, the report has been swapped by Wulie with a fake one. Zhiyuan found the original DNA report and is shocked that Ruli is her biological daughter. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)看到如莉与智媛的亲子检测显示她们没亲子关系，感到安慰。其实武烈把原本的报告更换.原本的报告被智媛找到，发现如莉竟是她亲生女儿。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 8
programme.desc: With around 8 million bikes plying the streets, traffic fatalities are the main cause of death in Ho Chi Minh City. Danny Yeo stakes out at Cho Ray Hospital's emergency unit to witness the hard work and heartbreak that takes place round the clock - all due to a moment of recklessness on the roads. 越南是公路意外高发国，每年夺走8000多条人命。主持人杨君伟在胡志明市体验800万辆电单车在道路上横冲直撞的险象环生，并亲往医院急诊室，看医护人员如何分秒必争抢救车祸伤者。一时不慎，代价惨重。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 16
programme.desc: Wenshu holds a press conference to claim that she was not involved in the murder case and also announces that she will run for the position of Chief Justice. Soon after, Wenshu is attacked by a convict's father. News of her injuries overshadow the news of her suspected involvement in a murder. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)文淑召开记者会，坚称自己跟18年前黄金城市负责人的失踪案没有关系，并宣布接受大法院院长候选人的提名。其后，文淑被一名死囚的父亲攻击，当场头破血流。文淑被袭击的新闻掩盖18年前照片的事件。本来是加害者的文淑突然变成了受害者。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Many volunteers leave their comfort zones for unfamiliar territory. They seek to improve the lives of others, not knowing their lives will be changed too. What challenges do they face, and are they psychologically prepared? (重)为了改善别人的生活，许多义工不惜从舒适圈出走，去到陌生、落后的国度。很多人都没有想到，在改变别人以前，他们首先改变了自己的人生。当踌躇满志的义工踏上柬埔寨这片千疮百孔的土地传递温暖的时候，做了什么心理准备？又面对了什么挑战？.

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Why do people from the East eat tofu but the people from the West do not? Cheese is only loved by Eurasian, Han people in the past did not eat cheese? This episode, Guo Liang, Axian and Pornsak discuss on the history, production and ways of eating various cheese from the west and tofu from the east. (重)这集的节目主题是乳酪和豆腐。为什么东方人吃豆腐，而西方人没有吃豆腐的习惯？乳酪只有欧亚人喜欢，以往的汉人不吃乳酪？郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak会为我们介绍不同种类的西方乳酪和东方豆腐的历史，制作和吃法。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) JY Group and Xun Design bid for the same project again. Zhexiong is unhappy and issue a challenge to Xuncai. If JY Group loses the project, he will have to apologise to Xuncai for the sabotage earlier. If Xun Design were to be unsuccessful in the bid, he will have to work for Zhexiong. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)JY集团和勋设计又同时竞标同一个项目。哲雄很不满，向勋才发出挑战。如果哲雄竞标失败，就必须为之前耍手段一事向勋才道歉。如果勋才失败，就得到哲雄的公司工作。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) A junior is eyeing on Nali's weather forecast presenter post. She purposely offers Nali barbecued meat, coaxes Nali to consume alcohol and soils Nali's clothes before the seven o'clock news starts so that Nali cannot host the program. Zhengyuan keeps thinking of Nali, who sat beside him on the flight to Bangkok. He goes to the TV station to look for her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)一位后辈觊觎娜丽气象预报员的位置，故意在七点开播前请娜丽吃烤肉和劝表娜丽喝酒，并故意弄脏娜丽的衣服，让她不能主持节目。正元总是想起那飞往曼谷的飞机上坐在身边的气象预报员娜丽，为了再见到她，他去电视台找她。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 73
programme.desc: Zhiyuan is arrested by the Police for kidnapping Zhuhao but the latter assures the Police that Zhiyuan is innocent. Zhuhao tells Ruli that she is only his adopted daughter. Zhiyuan feels ashamed to acknowledge Ruli. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)因涉嫌绑架及软禁柱浩之罪，智媛被警方逮捕，但柱浩向警方否认智媛之罪。柱浩跟如莉坦言她是被领养而智媛觉得自己没资格认回如莉。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 74
programme.desc: Zhiyuan overheard Haizhu and Wulie planning to thwarts Daozhi's project, so she secretly helped Daozhi. Haizhu frames Ruli by setting fire to the garment factory. Zhiyuan saves Ruli but Ruli names Zhiyuan as the arsonist during the police interrogation. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛听到海珠与武烈将要破坏道治计划，便暗中帮忙道治。海珠陷害如莉纵火工厂。智媛救出如莉却被她指证纵火嫌疑者。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 3
programme.desc: A total of 15,000 cases of missing children and teenagers have been reported in Malaysia in the last 8 years. In this episode, we delve into the stories of one father searching for his missing son and a family trying to uncover the truths behind the disappearance of their father 人生最痛，莫过于生离死别。马来西亚人口失踪问题严重，单单儿童青少年失踪案，8年来就接获1万5千宗投报。不论是主动或被动失踪，都已经敲响了国家安全的警钟。这些人失踪背后的真相，到底是什么？.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 17
programme.desc: Shangbi realises that it must be Wenshu who sent him the journal previously. Her aim is to make use of him to get rid of those who know her secrets. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)尚弼终于明白是文淑把笔记本寄给他，把他引到绮城去的。文淑的目的是要利用尚弼帮她除掉知道她把柄的人，借刀杀人。.

programme.title: Juxbox Ekspres
programme.desc: Groove to the music videos by local and regional talents in Juxbox Ekspres.

programme.title: Pinggan Tak Retak, Nasi Tak Dingin - EP 9
programme.desc: Yuhanis is left by her fiancee, Nizam a day before their wedding. To hold the family honor, her brother-in-law, Mizan marries her but with a condition. As they are beginning to fall in love, his ex-wife Suraya comes back to win him back. What will happen to Yuhanis?

programme.title: Izinkan Aku Mencintaimu - EP 8
programme.desc: Merah is curious about Fendi who has been behaving strange lately. She decides to investigate and to her disappointment, she finds out that he has an affair with another woman. Feeling cheated, she wants to get a divorce from him.

What will Hari have to sacrifice in order to capture the man who made him lose everything? Arivaan, an intense psychological thriller, pits two men in a brutal cat and mouse game.
